title: FS: Lot of Low/Mid-Grade T205 SPs & HOF **ALL SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of Low/Mid-Grade T205 SPs & HOF **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale.  These are mostly low grade, as the scans will show, but with a few nicer mid to higher grade examples as well.  Several tougher SPs and HOFers here!

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Moved a couple of remaining cards on the list to a new lot listed today.  All the rest are SOLD.  Thanks for looking!

If you'd like to take a look at the new listing, here it is:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=2502549[/url]
Consolidated pics into first post.

Ben
